actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide an additional personal exemption of $750 for members of of a volunteer fire company, ambulance team, first aid corps or rescue squad.

summary.text: Provides under the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 an additional personal exemption of $750 for members of a volunteer fire company, ambulance team, first aid corps, or rescue squad.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide an additional personal exemption of $750 for members of of a volunteer fire company, ambulance team, first aid corps or rescue squad.
